title: Best of the Program | Guests: Savanah Hernandez & Jeff Brown | 5/11/22
description:
Despite rising inflation, the New York Times argues that times haven't been this good since man landed on the moon. Host of "Rapid Fire" Savanah Hernandez joins to share the horrors she saw firsthand while visiting the border. Founder and chief investment analyst for Brownstone Research Jeff Brown joins to discuss President Biden's latest actions regarding quantum computing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
